file_content.text: Most vengeful and terrible Lord of the Sith. This humble worm begs a moment of your time.
Most clever and most wise Lord of the Sith. This humble worm begs a moment of your time.
Agent. Defender. Keeper of all the Empire and its people. This humble worm begs a moment of your time.
Most ferocious of hunters. Most terrible and deadly of the galaxy's warriors. This humble worm begs a moment of your time.
Such august and renowned companions. This humble worm begs a moment of your time.
I have the deep honor to be the messenger and property of the great Lord Serjay Thul, first Sith Lord of Alderaan blood.
Your help is desperately needed back on Alderaan, and Lord Thul has sent me to humbly beg for your return in his hour of need.
Of course. And Lord Thul understands this. Without your help, though, Alderaan will fall and everything you achieved there will have been for naught.
Forgive me, but I cannot speak of such things here. Please, go to Alderaan, meet with Lord Thul or everything achieved there will be for naught!
I thank you. Alderaan, and indeed the entire Empire, will soon thank you as well.
Please, meet Lord Thul at Castle Thul on Alderaan as soon as can possibly be arranged.
I've just arrived. Overwhelming, isn't it?
My lord has given me permission to stay and explore the fleet. A reward I cherish.
